Bison: - ^ **25%** reduced aux power drain from all sources
- ^ **25%** reduced direct vitals damage received to during maneuvers
- ^ **50%** increased snare resistance, snare immunity while Core active
- ^ While below **50%** defense: **25%** reduced aux power drain from all sources, **25%** increased acceleration + gain an additional aerial maneuver charge
- ^ While below **50%** vitals: **25%** increased defense regeneration + vitals restored from all sources
- ^ **15%** increased speed + dexterity while Core active
- ^ **0-25%** Reduced Core activation cost scaling proportionally with remaining vitals from **100-50%**
Hydra: - ^ **25%** of visible damage dealt during maneuvers restored to vitals, increased by **5%** for each Adrenal Feedback stack
- ^ **5%** increased speed, dexterity, weapon accuracy + backup weapon damage on killing an enemy during maneuvers or within **4 m**, stacking up to **5** times
- ^ Neuro-link 'Parasite' while Core active: Leech **5** vitals from all visible enemies every **0.5 s**, increased by **1** for each Adrenal Feedback stack on activation
- ^ **5 /s** additional vitals regeneration, increased by **0.5 /s** for each Adrenal Feedback stack
- ^ **25%** of direct head + limb vitals damage received restored after **2 s** of last direct damage, increased by **5%** for each Adrenal Feedback stack
- ^ Defense regeneration restores max defense while Core is active
- @  **5%** increased debuff duration + bleed damage received for each Adrenal Feedback stack
- ^ Vitals restored by Adrenal Feeback, Regenetics + Adaptive Recovery increases + restores max vitals up to **200** vitals
- ^ **50** vitals restored on Core activation, **10 s** cooldown
- ^ **50** vitals restored on defense depletion, **10 s** cooldown
Ghost: - ^ Reduces visibility, undetectable by proximity devices + targeting systems, **50** additional temporary defense for **2 s** after deactivation, **2 s** cooldown
- ^ **25%** reduced loadout speed penalty + detectable range while active
- ^ Deep Camouflage: Activates **2 s** after being stationary or crouched, **50%** reduced visibility and undetectable by targeting optics
- @  **2 s** stun on taking direct damage while Deep Camouflage active
- @  **50%** defense regeneration, damage received bypasses defense while active
- ^ **25%** increased dexterity, weapon accuracy + backup weapon damage
- ^ **50%** reduced explosive damage received during maneuvers
- ^ **0.25x** additional headshot multiplier with firearms + **25%** defense bypass with backup weapons for **2 s** after camouflage deactivation
- ^ **25%** reduced detectable range + scrambled radar profile while moving with camouflage active
- ^ Surge AOE on camouflage deactivate: Disable enemies + enemy devices within **4 m** for **2 s**, Shroud on camouflage activate: undetectable by all equipment for **2 s**

- ^ Neuro-link 'Breach' on core activation: Deals **25** vital damage and **2 s** disable + snare to visible or detected enemies, executes if target below **25%** vitals, destroys visible or detected devices, **10 s** cooldown
Dragon: - ^ Can activate hover while in air, **8 m/s** hover speed up to **12 m/s** while boosting, enhanced dodge + dive, unaffected by loadout + movement speed penalties while hover active, body impacts while boosting can knockback + knockdown, **4 s** cooldown
- ^ Air Dash maneuver: Launch in movement direction while in air and hover not active, can knockback + knockdown

- ^ Ground Slam maneuver: Launch downward to ground while in air, deals **50-25** explosive + fire damage damage within **2-4 m**, enemies within **2 m** can be knocked down, requires **3 m** altitude, **10 s** cooldown
- @ Deactivates on boost and Ground Slam impact
- ^ Backdraft AOE on drifter pack activation while enemies nearby or body impact while boosting: Ignites enemies within **4 m** for **25** fire damage, **3 s** cooldown
- ^ Ignites surrounding area for **3 s** on death

- ^ Neuro-link 'Combust' on Core activation: Ignites visible enemies, dealing **25** fire damage per enemy, up to **100** damage, ignited enemies receive **50%** increased direct defense damage, **10 s** cooldown
- ^ **50%** increased fire resistance, fire stat reduction immunity + **25%** defense restored per enemy hit by Backdraft
- ^ **0-50%** increased explosive resistance while hovering, scaling proportionally with speed from **0-12 m/s**
- ^ **0-20 /s** additional defense regeneration with no delay while hovering or during maneuvers, scaling proportionally with speed from **0-12 m/s**
Rhino: - ^ **25%** increased knockdown + knockback resistance, increased knockdown force, **50%** reduced fall damage
- ^ **50%** reduced movement speed penalties while defence above **50%**
- ^ Bolster while Core active: Bleed + knockdown immunity, **0 s** defense regen delay, **40 /s** defense regeneration
- @  **50%** reduced vitals restored from all sources while Core active
- ^ Shockwave AOE on body impact or heavy landing: Deals **50-25** shock damage and **2 s** disable + snare to enemies within **4 m**, **3 s** cooldown
- ^ **50%** of damage dealt by Shockwave restored to defense + max defense
- ^ **25%** of direct damage received reflected as shock damage + **0.5 s** disable if enemy within **3 m** while defense above **0%**
- ^ **25-0%** reduced direct defense damage received, scaling proportionally with speed from **0-8 m/s**
- ^ Damage taken to vitals is restored to defense when defense regeneration resumes
